attributes.action: ban metal cutlery-ban knives-ban wooden cricket and baseball equipment-ban guns
attributes.additional_details: Nationwide effort to minimize and remove items and chances of unnecessary pain and consequence
attributes.background: We need to remove public access to such items thus minimizing domestic violence-murder and such forth-More use of hands when eating-advocate for community football and other activities to avoid individual isolation that often leads to thoughts and dangerous actions and long term pain-consequences

rejection.details: We understand you're concerned about violent crime, but we are not sure exactly what action you'd like the Government to take. We are not sure if you'd like all metal cutlery and all knives to be banned, including those used to prepare food. You could start a petition setting out clearly what you would like to happen.
